name: Time
description: Time is a musical experience designed for Virtual Reality where geometry and materials react to audio while using 3D sounds to increase the immersiveness.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1, Windows 10 Processor: Intel i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4000 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 900 MB available space Additional Notes: Headphones recommended
